bio.summary: Ten Madison (aka Peter Jürgens, Jürgens & Peter Gun), is a downtempo / drum and bass / Psychill / psytrance artist, from Germany - signed to (c) 2006 Millennium Records Ltd. (& variants). He's released five 'chillout' albums, all well reviewed & attracting fans. However, his talent & energy surpass any simple 'ambient' labelling. As "Peter Gun" he successfully provides the four-to-the-floor oriented club area for years now and thrilled numerous fans and critics with the albums "Pressure Point" and "Thicker than Blood". Read more on Last.fm
bio.content: Ten Madison (aka Peter Jürgens, Jürgens & Peter Gun), is a downtempo / drum and bass / Psychill / psytrance artist, from Germany - signed to (c) 2006 Millennium Records Ltd. (& variants). He's released five 'chillout' albums, all well reviewed & attracting fans. However, his talent & energy surpass any simple 'ambient' labelling. As "Peter Gun" he successfully provides the four-to-the-floor oriented club area for years now and thrilled numerous fans and critics with the albums "Pressure Point" and "Thicker than Blood". His remixography shines with works for top acts like The KLF, Nalin & Kane, Proper Filthy Naughty, Da Hool, Tocadisco or Oliver Klein. Not only as an individual artist, also in a team he is unbeatable. Next to various successful co-productions with artists like Oliver Klein or Sven Palzer, Peter Juergens builds the project "Prawler" alongside Oliver Moldan, and gave the project the typical sound, a futuristic appearing techhouse-act with crossover aspects. Together they released on famous labels such as Superstar Rec., Bedrock and Renaissance. A duo, whose tracks lead to ecstasy on the dance floors with a mixture of progressive, tech house and trance. This collaboration work ends in 2006. Peter change his musical direction, and do more on his own. Besides his various pseudonyms and co-operations, Peter Juergens also releases under his real name on Electribe and Room Records "I make music just as I fancy it, I don´t care if it cracks and rustles sometimes, it`s part of the music. I try to make my own sound". Peter Juergens knows what he wants. Success and wealth only get little of his attention. Maybe some coevals may call this attitude arrogant, but they´re wrong. The likeable striking head´s solely aim is to touch people´s soul with his art. Whether clubsound or chillout doesn´t really bother him. His formula for success is to handle music as a snapshot of what one just feels. Frisky or experimental, driving or progressive, groovy or funky: It´s hard for Peter Juergens to explicitly define his music. But that´s no surprise, because the multi-talent from Unna baffles himself again and again with his versatility. His individual interpretation of progressive electro house isn´t only well received in our country. International top DJs like Pete Tong, John Digweed, Timo Maas, Sander Kleineberg, Deep Dish or Seb Fontaine support the talented producer. The British press extols the "german beatmaster" (DJ Magazine) and the English audience brims over with enthusiasm for his typical Progressive-club-sound, which he also performs live. Peter Juergen´s creativity seems to be inexhaustible in all his projects. Whatever he gets his golden producer hands on, let it be a remittance work in the name of a major, it succeeds. Besides his music he also realizes his visual ideas as an in-demand tattoo artist. His extravagant motives already decorate many of his fellow artists as well as one or the other music external celebrity. "It simply is inside of me", the usually not shy artist admits, when asked about his inventiveness. His music and his body art prove this. By creating his own Sound, and addictive groove he`s magic behind the decks and take him to play at festivals like Fusion Festival, Akasha Festival...and clubs around europe, even the World.. Labels, on which Peter Juergens releases: Superstar Rec., Electribe, Mutekki, Sloope, Midijum, Drizzly, Millenium Rec., Bedrock, Ministry of Sound, Mauritius Rec., On A Mission, Sure Player, Urban Rec., Fourty-5-Records, Clubstar, Silly Spider,Black-Chrome, Four-Sense, Bliss Rec. USA, Audio Therapy, Room Records.... ... Artists, who Peter Juergens produce: Oliver klein, Oliver Moldan, Sven Palzer, Dabruck & Klein (Superstar DJ Team), Melanie di Tria, zuHouse Rockers, Björn Mandry, Jackson, Arthur Gore, Plastik Funk, Buck & Morane, Stefan Bader, Mario de Bellis, Cramer Rouse, DJ Elle, Bleech and Skinner, Alexander Ligowski, Dj Fish, Klaus Schneider, Jürgen Driessen, Baggy Bukkador, SBK, Orhan Terzi, DJ Gee (Bora Bora)... to be continued.... Artists, whose tracks Peter Juergens remixed: The KLF, Nalin & Kane, Proper Filthy Naughty, Tocadisco, Oliver Klein, Da Hool, Yahel, DJ Spud, DJ Errik, H.A.N.Z. & DJ 88 Keys, Kai Tracid, Danzel, Roboterwerke, Punk Division, Königskinder, Syndicate of Law, Kores vs Robotnico, Pete Lazonby, Milk&Sugar, Axwell, Dreamcatcher, Phil&Habersham,Flat Pack, Lopsinger, De Bellis con Stenzel, DJ Bossi, Da Carlo, to be continued...
